pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Hidden Population Size using Respondent Driven Sampling Data // Estimate the size of a networked population based on respondent-driven sampling data. The package is part of the "RDS Analyst" suite of packages for the analysis of respondent-driven sampling data. See Handcock, Gile and Mar (2014) doi:10.1214/14-EJS923, Handcock, Gile and Mar (2015) doi:10.1111/biom.12255, Kim and Handcock (2021) doi:10.1093/jssam/smz055, and McLaughlin, et. al. (2023) doi:10.1214/23-AOAS1807.
